Text:
CYBERJAYA: The account used to upload a claim that a Malaysia Airlines (MAS) aircraft had gone missing from radar is fake, says the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC). MMMC chief security officer of network, enforcement and advocacy Zulkarnain Mohd Yasin said the fake news had been uploaded by someone using the fictitious name 'Sharifah Sofia Syed Rashid'.
